title: Consolidate Righteous Truths to Version 1 master foundation

requirements.text: Verify all AI-powered creative tools are functional: coloring page generator, affirmation creator, meme creator, and DTF artwork generator in the Creative Studio
acceptanceCriteria: All four creative tools render and accept user input
Generated content can be saved to the backend
Tools are accessible from the Creative Studio page

requirements.text: Ensure DTF gallery and store are fully operational with upload, preview, purchase, and download functionality
acceptanceCriteria: DTF gallery displays all uploaded designs with search and filtering
Users can upload new DTF designs through UploadDtfModal
Purchase flow works end-to-end with Stripe checkout
Purchased designs are downloadable from My Purchases page

requirements.text: Verify admin dashboard includes all management features: uploads, licensing approvals, royalties tracking, and analytics metrics
acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard displays user metrics, content stats, and revenue analytics
Admin can approve or reject licensing requests
Admin can upload content through AdminUploadContentModal
Royalty automation data is visible and accurate

requirements.text: Confirm licensing and royalty automation is synchronized between backend and frontend with proper consent workflow
acceptanceCriteria: LicensingConsentModal allows creators to set royalty splits and usage terms
LicensingBadge displays accurate licensing information on content cards
Backend tracks and calculates royalties correctly
Licensing status is visible in content detail pages and creator dashboards

requirements.text: Verify embedded checkout links are functional and properly integrated with Stripe payment processing
acceptanceCriteria: Content detail pages generate valid Stripe checkout sessions
Payment success page records purchases and provides download access
Payment failure page displays appropriate messaging
Checkout sessions handle licensing information correctly

requirements.text: Ensure privacy policy is accessible and complete with all required legal sections
acceptanceCriteria: LegalPrivacyPage renders with data collection and user rights sections
Privacy policy is linked from footer navigation
Content is properly formatted and scrollable

requirements.text: Verify optimized branding is consistently applied across all pages including logos, colors, typography, and animated interactive buttons
acceptanceCriteria: Brand colors and typography are consistent across all pages
AnimatedButton components are used throughout the UI with smooth hover effects
Header and Footer display proper branding elements
Navigation is smooth and responsive

requirements.text: Confirm all essential legal pages are complete and accessible: Terms of Service, Copyright Notice, Refund Policy, and Privacy Policy
acceptanceCriteria: All four legal pages render with complete content
Legal pages are accessible from footer navigation
Pages use consistent formatting and UI components

requirements.text: Verify production checklist validates all critical configurations: Stripe setup, SEO metadata, environment settings, and admin permissions
acceptanceCriteria: ProductionChecklistPage runs all automated checks
Stripe configuration is verified
SEO metadata is present on all major pages
Admin role enforcement is working

requirements.text: Ensure embeddable widgets are functional and properly adapt when loaded in iframe contexts
acceptanceCriteria: EmbedWidget component detects iframe context correctly
Widget links to appropriate site sections
Widget renders responsively

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo actor architecture
Preserve all existing frontend immutable paths including hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, hooks/useActor.ts, main.tsx, and components/ui
Keep all legal content intact without modifications
nonGoals: Adding new features beyond what is already implemented
Changing the technology stack or framework choices
Adding real-time features or WebSocket support
